title: Which do you prefer, Fender Stratocaster or Gibson Les Paul? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. Personally, I own, play and like both type of guitars but I tend to prefer a Fender Stratocaster over a Gibson Les Paul - depends to a certain degree on the music, amp and the setting (live, recording a.s.o) though. I would have to add that I don’t just prefer a guitar because it’s a Fender or Gibson style - it has way more to do with the individual guitar - I’ve played lots of both brands that I don’t really like. I also tend to find a lot of the Gibson Les Paul guitars a bit overpriced for what you get.
